All occupational coverages are issued by employing Florida school districts.

Repealed Certification Areas

Journalism (grades 6-12) - the State Board of Education repealed this coverage effective June 23, 2016

Speech (grades 6-12) - the State Board of Education repealed this coverage effective June 23, 2016

Teacher Coordinator of Cooperative Education - the State Board of Education repealed this endorsement effective June 23, 2016

Teacher Coordinator of Work Experience Programs - the State Board of Education repealed this endorsement effective June 23, 2016

Middle Grades Integrated Curriculum (grades 5-9) - the State Board of Education repealed this coverage effective October 25, 2011

Please refer to the October 31, 2011 memorandum (PDF) for details.

The High Demand Teacher Needs Report identifies which certification areas represent the greatest need among teachers statewide. The information in this report is not a direct measure of the number of new teachers needed to staff Floridaâ€™s schools but can be used to determine the projected needs for specific subject area coverages in the upcoming school year. The high demand areas represent certification areas where the gaps between supply and demand are the greatest.
